Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work
79
CHECKING COMPETENCY QUESTIONS (I)
---------------------
|X
|
=====================
|Dextrometorphan
|CitrateOfChlorpheniramine
|Caffeine
|Paracetamol
---------------------
# CQ2
SELECT ?X
WHERE
{
?X ub:isProperPartOf
ub:FrenadolSubstance .
}
Which is the 
composition of 
Frenadol®?
---------------------
|X
|
=====================
|FrenadolSubstance
|BisolgripSubstance
|CortafriolSubstance
|DolgesicSubstance
|TermalginSubstance
|AlgidolSubstance
|EfferalganSubstance
|DolostopSubstance
|GelocatilSubstance
|ApiretalSubstance
|PharmagripSubstance
---------------------
# CQ1
SELECT ?X
WHERE
{
?X rdf:type ub:DrugSubstance .
ub:Paracetamol ub:isProperPartOf ?X .
}
What drugs do have 
paracetamol?
Example of answer
Formal CQ
Informal CQ
